item.description: Sketch of a look at the ‘grand challenges’ of Kintigh et al. 2014.

item.description: A simple adventure game in Unity2D. Revolves around being an archaeologist exploring some ruin and digging up treasure/fossils

item.description: An Archaeology Stop Motion Movie Festival!

item.description: Colossal Cave Adventure digital palaeography and epigraphy project.

item.description: Dashboard showing ceramic EDA and interaction network construction in the Late Prehistoric Central Illinois River Valley.

item.description: Proof of concept map for disaster response and archaeology

item.title: gods_on_the_barge
item.description: Inspired by the research project of historiography of ancient Graeco-Roman religions, the main goal is to spread a selected cult successfully across the ancient Mediterranean

item.description: Contains data and R code for our article on computational text analysis of racism in archaeology.

item.description: Backend for one of the largest 14C-Database online.

item.title: sipontomedievale
item.description: This repo contains the code for an interactive website created to illustrate historical background, findings and data of the Siponto excavation site (Manfredonia, Italy)
